sub_title: Product Owner | Business Transformation Specialist | Digital Enterprise Architect | Cloud Computing | TOGAF | Troubleshooter and more...
summary:
I am passionate about solving business problems with clever use of technology. I love architecting IT systems that drive transformation. I am an expert in transformation, program management and agile delivery. I have worked in multiple different roles, and in wide range of industry domains. Currently I am enabling business transformation at ManpowerGroup, defining the new architecture that makes my customer future ready.

I love to help others. I have mentored numerous young professionals, students and tutors. In my leisure time, I read technology articles and help my family with household activities. Do reach out to me for any queries on business transformation, architecture, product management or on anything where you feel I can assist.

school.name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

education.field_of_study: Software Systems (with specialization in Data Analytics)

certifications.name: IBM Certified Application Developer - Cloud Platform V1

profile_positions.description: Leading the Front Office Product Organization of ManpowerGroup since its inception. Played a major role in shaping this organization and nurturing it to maturity. The Front Office team manages all Bullhorn implementation – old and new, Microsoft Dynamics and in-house product ROMA.
profile_positions.title: Product Lead (Global Program Director) - Front Office Product Organization at ManpowerGroup

profile_positions.description: Leading the business transformation of ManpowerGroup Netherlands, Spain, Italy and Switzerland as the Lead Enterprise Architect for Greenfield Program (Netherlands) and SIS PowerSuite Program (Spain, Italy and Switzerland).
profile_positions.title: Lead Enterprise Architect – Responsible for the Business Transformation of ManpowerGroup Europe

profile_positions.description: Canon Europe has a unique Model Driven ERP product to support their Sales to Service business. Worked with Canon and vendor architects, to stabilize the product and deliver value to Canon. Also transitioned the product to Canon and setup the new development processes. Also, conceptualized, architected and created development framework for the new tool to address the download issues with this product.
profile_positions.title: Lead Architect - Led the stabilization efforts for Offers and Contract application for Canon | SAFe

profile_positions.description: Part of the Digital Enterprise Architecture team of the Digital and Enterprise Transformation group of HiTech industry vertical of TATA Consultancy Services. We help our customers get Digital ready, and provide consultancy in formulation and execution of their Digital strategy and roadmap. Very privileged to work in this team, helping shape the future of Digital world.
profile_positions.title: Digital Enterprise Architect - Helping customers in their Digital Journey

profile_positions.description: Had bagged the task of reviewing the learning portal of a leading business management consultancy organization. The project was to be executed with a distributed team operating from 3 different locations. Had demonstrated our technical skills and provided recommendations for the betterment of the portal.
profile_positions.title: Lead Consultant - Application review for a leading business management consultancy firm

profile_positions.description: Lead a highly distributed team of 8 bright associates operating from 5 different locations, following Agile to develop estimation tool for digital projects. This period was of immense learning in Agile project execution, stakeholder management, managing distributed team along with the technical learning.
profile_positions.title: Lead Architect - Estimation tool for Digital projects | Agile delivery

profile_positions.description: As part of Digital and Enterprise Transformation group of HiTech vertical, provided my consultancy services to the Adobe account. Studied Adobe’s enterprise landscape, captured them as Archimate models, and suggested enhancements for throughput improvements. Problem statement was to be able to cater the expected workload on the IT systems, 2 years down the line.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Architect - AS IS Architecture study and defining TO BE Architecture

profile_positions.description:
Worked as Product Architect cum Owner for iTP WebServer and SOAP product sets for HPE (NonStop Enterprise Division). Architected new product features, and defined the roadmap for iTP WebServer. Resolved multiple complex issues related to performance, TLS 1.2 connection denial, GnuTLS connection drops, and more. Had been instrumental in the success of the iTP WebServer 7.5 program.

Also lead the Technology Solutions Group (TSG) at TCS-HP Lab Mumbai. The charter was to promote technical excellence by nurturing innovation, creating assets and tools, and assisting in complex problem resolutions.
profile_positions.title: Product Architect/Owner - WebServer products

profile_positions.description:
Worked as Project Manager for Middleware and Tools product set. Sustained these products with a bright team of professionals. Successfully delivered programs TS/MP 2.4, TS/MP 2.5, 64-bit support along with other smaller Request For Enhancements (RFEs).

Also actively participated in resolution of complex technical issues. Successfully implemented logical file I/O based multi-threading in ACS (TS/MP 2.x). Resolved critical problems for multiple NonStop customers like PSA, Vodacom, VISA, Paymentech, Wells Fargo etc.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Middleware and Tools products

profile_positions.description: Worked as QA Manager for Hewlett-Packard (Media & Entertainment Division) for their DMP – Digital Content Services platform. The project execution was in Agile Scrum methodology. Ensured the product quality meet the expected standards.
profile_positions.title: QA Manager - Delivery of Digital Media Platform for Media & Entertainment Industry | Agile delivery

profile_positions.description: Hewlett-Packard had tried an entry into the BI market with its offering NeoView. I worked on the DB Transporter tool as a Senior Developer. Enhanced the ODBC daemon server to meet the requirements of this tool. Also designed and developed the test framework for this tool for the QA team. My paper presented on this test framework won a price in an internal TCS competition.
profile_positions.title: Senior Developer - Development of the HP NeoView BI Platform

profile_positions.description: Worked as Project Lead for TS/MP, Pathway and DSM/SCM set of product for Hewlett-Packard (NonStop Enterprise Division).
profile_positions.title: Project Lead - Delivery of Middleware and System Configuration products

profile_positions.description:
Indigo was a startup company in Chennai India, who needed to run Tuxedo clients (Tuxedo Bridge) under iTP WebServer for a stock exchange application. Indigo approached HP for getting the Tuxedo Bridge developed. HP subcontracted it to TCS.

Architected the Tuxedo Bridge application which was a multi-threaded CGI server for the iTP WebServer, but at the same time it was a Tuxedo client as well.
profile_positions.title: Technical Architect - Helping HP vendors in capability building

profile_positions.description:
Worked for Hewlett-Packard (NonStop Enterprise Division) as Module Lead for Transaction Services project. Implemented many Requests For Enhancements (RFEs) and sustained TS/MP, Pathway and DSM/SCM products. Also lead many process improvements in my role as Process Prime.

Also initiated an internal project NonStop RSVP to develop an in-house resource reservation and online checklist application on NonStop platform using J2EE (NonStop JSP which is a port of tomcat to NonStop) and client server architecture under Pathway. This application remained active seamlessly for a decade till the closure of the project.
profile_positions.title: Module Lead - Delivery of Middleware and System Configuration products

profile_positions.description:
Worked as a consultant to Opus Consulting Solutions (then Opus Software Solutions Private Limited) to create apps for credit card statements and alerts. It supported generation of card statements in four different formats viz. Word document, Text, PDF and HTML. It had a facility by which a cardholder can specify a delivery mechanism suitable to them.

The Alert app was capable of generating alerts based on events like salary credit, payment due date, transactions beyond a particular limit value, change in personal details, etc.
profile_positions.title: Technical Architect - Credit Card statement and Alerts

profile_positions.description: Worked as Business Analyst and did requirement study for the Western Union Messaging services.
profile_positions.title: Business Requirements Analyst - Requirements study for Western Union Messaging services

profile_positions.description: Worked as a Consultant to Opus Consulting Solutions (then Opus Software Solutions Private Limited) on MasterCard IPM project. It was development of new software for the then new IPM credit card settlement format by Master Card. IPM replaces INET fixed format settlement process.
profile_positions.title: System Analyst - Credit Card settlement

profile_positions.description: The project was extension to the existing Phone Pay system. It included support to TCP/IP communication channel along with the existing X.25 support. Also more administrative screens were included, so as to make the system totally free of manual intervention.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineer - Development of Phone Pay (Phase II)

profile_positions.description: Worked as a consultant for Opus Consulting Solutions (then Opus Software Solutions Private Limited) on India's first Electronic Bill Presentment and Payment (EBPP) system. Had done the performance tuning of the whole system. Was also responsible for reviews and integration testing.
profile_positions.title: Performance Analyst - Performance improvement to the Bill Presentment and Payment System

profile_positions.description: Worked on the Unify project. Unify was a project management tool with inbuilt futures like version control, task management, resource allocation, project cost calculation, project tracking and much more. It was a single point solution to various different tools used in a project development lifecycle.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead - Development of Project Management tool, Unify

profile_positions.description: Worked on the Web Wizard project as Senior Developer. The objective was to assist fast development of web sites by developing most common web pages. The page and its URL are generated by Web Wizard as per the inputs given by the user. The user can place this URL on his website, from where they want to activate the web page generated by Web Wizard.
profile_positions.title: Senior Engineer - Development of tool to create quick web pages, Web Wizard

profile_positions.location: Paramus, NJ, USA; Mumbai Area, India
profile_positions.description: Worked in Western Union Phone Pay project (Phase I). This project enabled payments of bills over phone, just by calling the biller. The then Western Union VP Camille Goulet had highly appreciated my contribution to this project.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead - Development of Phone Pay (Phase I)

profile_positions.description:
Worked on the BOLT project. BOLT was the screen based online trading system developed for Bombay Stock Exchange, based on client server architecture.

Started as a developer, rose to the position of Team Lead. Managed the Auction and Market Operations modules.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead - Management of Auction and Market Operations modules

profile_positions.description:
Worked on the Surveillance project along with my primary BOLT responsibilities. The goal of this project was to detect irregularities by providing online data feed of trades and other trading instruments to the Surveillance department of the Bombay Stock Exchange.

As the Team Lead, involved in design, development, coordination with Surveillance FE team and automation of the module.
profile_positions.title: Team Lead - Development of the Surveillance system for BSE
